d68004a","teacherPage/kaoyan/shared/components/teacherLivePanel/web/component.html":"8a6a38abcbf986afc8764b1da51ef89a","teacherPage/mooc/desktop/modules/course/index.html":"2438335c41dc980ab53ca664821ae8ba","teacherPage/mooc/desktop/modules/discuss/index.html":"32f6de12f01e346a1d1f75d47c7783e3","teacherPage/mooc/desktop/modules/index/index.html":"fe413d182f24c2d6a0db827137cd51fa","university/detail/desktop/modules/universityCenter/index.html":"55b773853a8326bd52c0d342594f612f","user/setting/accountSetting/desktop/modules/accountSetting/index.html":"80102126aaff6737dfdf90ef4d5a3651","user/setting/accountSetting/desktop/modules/mailSetting/index.html":"a79e05bc4cc1b7d45b5a3efdbc24c3d4","user/setting/personInfoEdit/desktop/modules/personInfoSetting/index.html":"5b76dba02a841ff5f5f8db30665c2cdc","user/teacherCenterEdit/desktop/modules/teacherCenterEdit/index.html":"edbf33e207c822c6b61e04ad8fc33db1","vocation/all/desktop/modules/vocation/index.html":"841f3f5f7fea82c1ce2c15386d54ae81"}};</script><script>

var $$$nativeWindowKeysCheckMap = {},
i = 0,
l = $$$nativeWindowKeys.length;
for (; i < l; i++) {
$$$nativeWindowKeysCheckMap[$$$nativeWindowKeys[i]] = 1;
}
window.__globalErrorEvents = [];
function errorEventHandler(e) {
window.__globalErrorEvents.push(e);
}
function addEvent(el, ev, fn) {
if (el) {
if (el.addEventListener) {
el.addEventListener(ev, fn);
} else if (el.attachEvent) {
el.attachEvent(ev, fn);
}
}
}
addEvent(window, 'error', errorEventHandler);
delete window.addEvent;
</script>
